{"step_by_step_thinking": "Based on the information provided in Document [2], GIC chemically (ionic) bonds to the tooth structure (enamel and dentin). The mechanism of GIC adhesion to the tooth's inorganic structure involves a chelation reaction between the carboxyl groups of the polyacrylic acid and the calcium in the hydroxyapatite crystals of the tooth.
